# [Preregistration] Putting in the Effort: Modulation of Multimodal Effort in Communicative Breakdowns during a Gestural-Vocal Referential Game

Authors: XXXX

This website documents data processing pipeline developed for the project **Modulation of Multimodal Effort in Communicative Breakdowns during a Gestural-Vocal Referential Game**. The pipeline covers every step from raw data ingestion to feature extraction and analysis, focusing on synchronizing and processing motion, audio, and derived signal data.

Below you'll find an overview of the steps in this workflow. Each step builds on the previous one, enabling modular processing and transparent documentation.

### HERE IMAGE FROM DATA

---

## Workflow Overview

### 1. Introduction
- [`intro.qmd`](intro.qmd): Overview of the project goals, data types, and guiding research questions.

### 2. XDF Processing
- [`xdf_workflow.ipynb`](01_XDF_processing/xdf_workflow.ipynb): Load and clean raw XDF data, align streams, and prepare for downstream processing.

### 3. Motion Tracking Processing
- [`01_Video_preparation.ipynb`](02_MotionTracking_processing/01_Video_preparation.ipynb): Prepare and crop video recordings.
- [`02_Track_OpenPose.ipynb`](02_MotionTracking_processing/02_Track_OpenPose.ipynb): Use OpenPose for 2D pose estimation.
- [`03_Track_pose2sim.ipynb`](02_MotionTracking_processing/03_Track_pose2sim.ipynb): Convert 2D coordinates to 3D using pose2sim.
- [`04_Track_InverseKinDyn.ipynb`](02_MotionTracking_processing/04_Track_InverseKinDyn.ipynb): Compute inverse kinematics and dynamics.

### 4. Time Series Processing
- [`01_TS_processing_motion.ipynb`](03_TS_processing/01_TS_processing_motion.ipynb): Clean and interpolate motion signals, extract features.
- [`02_TS_processing_acoustics.ipynb`](03_TS_processing/02_TS_processing_acoustics.ipynb): Extract acoustic features.
- [`03_TS_merging.ipynb`](03_TS_processing/03_TS_merging.ipynb): Merge motion and acoustic time series.

### 5. Movement Annotation
- [`01_Classify_preparation.ipynb`](04_TS_movementAnnotation/01_Classify_preparation.ipynb): Segment time windows and prepare labels for training classifier.
- [`02_MovementClassifier.ipynb`](04_TS_movementAnnotation/02_MovementClassifier.ipynb): Train and evaluate classifiers for movement detection.
- [`03_InterAgreement.ipynb`](04_TS_movementAnnotation/03_InterAgreement.ipynb): Evaluate inter-annotator agreement.

### 6. Final Merge
- [`TS_mergeAnnotations.ipynb`](05_finalMerge/TS_mergeAnnotations.ipynb): Merge annotations with timeseries.

### 7. Concept Similarity
- [`ConceptNet_similarity.ipynb`](06_ConceptSimilarity/ConceptNet_similarity.ipynb): Assess semantic similarity between concepts using ConceptNet.

### 8. Feature Extraction
- [`TS_extraction.ipynb`](07_TS_featureExtraction/TS_extraction.ipynb): Extract final time series features for modeling.

### 9. Analysis (exploratory)
- [`01_PCA_featureDimensions.ipynb`](08_Analysis_XGBoost/01_PCA_featureDimensions.ipynb): Explore dimensionality of extracted features using PCA.
- [`02_XGBoost_effortIndicators.qmd`](08_Analysis_XGBoost/02_XGBoost_effortIndicators.qmd): Assess feature importance using XGBoost.

### 10. Analysis: statistical modelling
- [`Modelling_syntheticData.qmd`](09_Analysis_Modeling/Modelling_syntheticData.qmd)
